A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie killed all that TFA built. Good action movie\, horrible Star Wars Movie. Rogue One crushed this. I thought is started a little too slow(felt they could have trimmed 20 some minutes) and I didn't like how they didn't answer questions I wanted from the force awakens\,  wanted  more  snoek plasma\,  Knights of Ren  and Reys parents\,  I felt like when the movie left Luke Leah Rey and kylo it always went off on a tangent that kind of slowed it down\, did not like Flynn Rose story or Luke dying.... I thought the space fighting scenes were awesome as well as anything related to the force\, nice to see puppet yoda again\,  Over all it was good I just wish JJ Abrams had directed it you could tell the other director made it into more of a Marvel Comics movie than a Star Wars movie...but at least he is coming back for #9\,  Think the one you and I saw Force Awakens was the best of new ones...Oh and how they wasted the Princess's character and force powers\, why was Flynn in this movie again??
